documentation.description: Gets configuration and usage information about transforms.

transform_id.description: The id of the transform for which to get stats. '_all' or '*' implies all transforms

from.description: skips a number of transform configs, defaults to 0

size.description: specifies a max number of transforms to get, defaults to 100

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no transforms. (This includes `_all` string or when no transforms have been specified)

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

time.description: The unit in which to display time values
